mapper.select: SELECT * FROM injoy.task INNER JOIN injoy.user ON "user"."id" = "task"."authorUserId" where "projectId" = #{projectId} ORDER BY "crtDate" DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO injoy.task("taskId", "authorUserId", title, content, "projectId", "startDate", "closingDate", "fileId", process, progress, "managerId", priority) VALUES (#{authorUserId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{projectId}, #{startDate}, #{closingDate}, #{fileId}, #{process}, #{progress}, #{managerId}, #{priority})
